newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish consumer confidence down in December - survey.
newsitem.headline: Polish consumer confidence down in December - survey.

text.p: Polish consumer confidence indicators, measured by the Demoskop polling institute for the Rzeczpospolita daily, fell in December after rising in November, Demoskop said on Tuesday.
Demoskop's consumer confidence index was at 99 points in December after rising to 101 points in November.
The business climate index fell to 98 points in December from 99 in October and the index measuring propensity to spend fell to 100 points from 102 points.
The Demoskop survey was carried out between Demcember 5-10 among a representative random sample of 999 adult Poles.
